FAQ
Frequently Ask Questions
Which all areas do you cover in Dubai?
We provide Safety Equipment in Deira, Safety Equipment in Bur Dubai, Safety Equipment in Dubai Investment Park (DIP), DIP 1, DIP 2,
Safety Equipment in Dubai Industrial City (DIC), DIC 1, DIC 2, Safety Equipment in Jebel Ali Free Zone (JAFZA), JAFZA 1, JAFZA 2,
Safety Equipment in Dubai Airport Free Zone (DAFZA), Safety Equipment in Ras Al Khor, Safety Equipment in Al Quoz 1,
Safety Equipment in Al Quoz 2, Safety Equipment in Al Quoz 3, Safety Equipment in Al Quoz 4, Safety Equipment in Al Safa,
Safety Equipment in Al Qusais Industrial Area, Safety Equipment in Al Qubaisi Industrial Area, Safety Equipment in Umm Ramool,
Safety Equipment in Hamriyah Free Zone, Dubai Multi Commodities Centre, TECOM Business Parks, Dubai International Financial Centre (DIFC),
Dubai Silicon Oasis, Dubai Sports City, Dubai Media City, Dubai Health care City, Meydan Freezone, Dubai Flower Center, Dubai Maritime City,
Dubai Logistics City, Expo City, Dubai Academic City, Dubai Biotechnology and Bio-research Park, Dubai International Academic City,
Dubai International Financial Centre, Dubai Internet City, Dubai Knowledge Village, Dubai Outsource Zone, Dubai Studio City, Energy and Environment Park, International Media Production Zone, Jumeirah Lakes Towers
And any other Area of Dubai and UAE
What safety equipment does AAA Safe supply?
AAA Safe is your one-stop shop for a comprehensive range of high-quality
safety gears
, compliant with international standards.
We offer a wide variety of
Personal Protective Equipment (PPE)
,
fire safety gear
,
industrial safety supplies
, and everything you need to keep your workplace safe.
We are a trusted
Safety equipment Supplier in UAE
Can I trust AAA Safe to provide reliable safety equipment?
Absolutely. AAA Safe is brand of Abid and Ali Asgar General Trading LLC and we are a trusted safety equipment supplier in Dubai for last 15+ years
We only source products from trusted manufacturers and ensure all our equipment meets the international safety standards.
Your workers’ safety is important to us. In fact that is one of the reason why we started this business long ago
Do you offer bulk order discounts for businesses?
Yes, we understand the needs of businesses of all sizes. AAA Safe offers competitive pricing and attractive discounts for bulk orders.
Contact us today for a free quote and discuss your specific requirements if you want to work with a trusted safety equipment supplier in Dubai
Do you offer fast and reliable delivery across the Middle East and Africa?
Yes, AAA Safe understands the urgency of safety equipment needs.
We partner with shipping providers to ensure fast and reliable delivery throughout the Middle East and Africa.
You can manage your own logistics as well
Where can I read more about Workplace Safety Regulations by the UAE Government?
You can visit the official website for all the legal literature about the
Workplace Safety Guidelines by the UAE Government
https://u.ae/en/information-and-services/jobs/health-and-safety-at-workplace
AAA Safe: A Trusted name when it comes to Safety Equipment Supplier in UAE
Dubai’s businesses are all about growth.
So should your safety approach.
AAA Safe, your trusted safety partner since 2007, goes beyond products. We help you build a safer, more productive work environment.
What makes us different?
Top-Quality Gear:
Helmets, shoes,
fire blankets
, first aid kits – we have it all. Rigorously tested and meeting international safety standards, it’s quality you can trust.
Empower with Knowledge:
Safety isn’t just about equipment. Our experts provide customized training to equip your team with the skills to stay safe on the job.
Your Safety Shop:
One-stop shopping for all your needs. We offer a vast range of products and personalized support to ensure you have exactly what you need.
Why Choose AAA Safe?
Safety First:
It’s not just a slogan, it’s our core value. We’re here to keep your workers safe and your business thriving.
Global Reach, Local Focus:
We’ve grown beyond Dubai, but our dedication to local businesses remains strong. We understand your unique safety needs.
Ready to prioritize safety and success?
Contact AAA Safe today. Your Trusted Safety Equipment Supplier.
Let’s discuss your specific needs.
Dubai Safety Gear: Keep Your workers Safe
Busy workplaces? Keep your team safe with top safety gear! Think of it as armor for your workers.
Here’s what protects them:
Tough Boots:
Shield feet from sharp things, heavy stuff, and even electrical dangers.
Hard Hats:
Lifesavers in construction! Protect heads from falling objects.
Eye Protection:
Goggles keep eyes safe from splashes, dust, and flying bits.
Ear Plugs:
Loud noises?
Ear plugs
block noise, protecting hearing.
Extra Protection:
Jackets and coveralls shield from chemicals, fire, and other hazards.
Safe Hands:
Gloves protect hands when handling chemicals or heavy machinery.
First Aid Kits:
Accidents happen. Kits help with minor injuries until medical help arrives.
Warning Tapes
& Fire Blankets:
Tapes show danger zones. Blankets stop small fires!
Safety gear isn’t optional!
AAA Safe is Trusted Name and a Brand of
Abid and Ali Asgar General Trading LLC
We are a trusted
Safety Equipment Supplier in UAE
and we offer a wide range of top-quality safety Supplies and PPE gears
Want a safe workplace? Contact
AAA Safe
today!
Let’s discuss your needs and make your workplace safe!
Safety Equipment is More Than Just a Checklist
Safety gear isn’t just a tick box – it’s vital! It protects your workers, not just from fines but from life threatening accidents and injuries
Here’s why it matters:
Saves Lives:
Think construction helmets. They can stop minor bumps from turning serious.
Boosts Confidence:
The right gear lets workers focus on the job, not worry about getting hurt.
Keeps Work Flowing:
Fewer accidents mean less downtime. Workers with good safety equipment like harnesses and
earplugs
get more done, faster.
Saves Money:
Accidents cost big bucks! Medical bills, lawsuits, compensation – it all adds up. Quality safety gear helps avoid these costs.
Good Reputation:
Accidents hurt your image. Safety shows you care about your workers – that’s good for business!
Safety gear is an investment in your workers, your business, and your peace of mind.
AAA Safe offers top-quality safety equipment for Dubai businesses.
Contact us today! Let’s discuss your needs and make your workplace safe.
Find Your Dubai Safety Equipment Supplier: Top-Notch Gear & Training
Dubai’s booming! But safety can’t be an afterthought.
That’s where AAA Safe comes in! We are a trusted Safety Equipment Supplier in UAE
We’re more than just suppliers – we’re your safety partner.
Why Choose AAA Safe?
Wide Selection:
Helmets, shoes, first aid kits – we’ve got it all! Top-quality gear, rigorously tested and meeting international safety standards.
Expert Training:
Gear is great, but knowledge is power! Our trainers teach you and your team how to use everything effectively.
Dubai Safety Experts:
We understand the unique safety challenges businesses face here. We offer solutions that work!
Choose AAA Safe. Choose Safety. Choose Success.
Contact AAA Safe today! Let’s discuss your needs and find the perfect safety solutions for your workplace.

Helmets, harnesses ,
safety shoes
, safe workers.

title: About Us
body:
About Us
Home
About Us
AAA Safe: Your Trusted Safety Equipment Supplier in Dubai
Who we are
Your Safety Solutions Partner
AAA Safe Dubai is a trusted name in safety equipment wholesale, headquartered in Dubai. With a diverse range of products, including personal protective equipment, tools, fire safety gear, and more, we are dedicated to ensuring the safety of our clients and partners across the region.
Post Sales Support
High Quality
Fast Delivery
Trusted AAA Safe Brand
Our History
Decades of Safety Excellence
AAA Safe Dubai has evolved into a trusted name in safety equipment wholesale. We’ve expanded our offerings and forged lasting partnerships with industry leaders, committed to providing the best safety solutions.
Our unwavering commitment to quality, relentless pursuit of innovation, and dedication to sustainability are the driving forces propelling us forward. These principles guide us as we continually strive to set and raise new standards in the realm of safety excellence.
Years Experience

k+
2007
Opening store
A Milestone Moment
Our flagship store in Dubai represents a milestone, offering you direct access to top-quality safety products and expert guidance. Your safety is our priority.
2012
Launch business ecosystem
Our expansion into the business ecosystem signals a new era. We’re dedicated to providing comprehensive safety solutions and support for your success.
2015
Expansion business cross overseas
Venturing into international markets opens new global horizons for us. We are committed to extending our safety solutions worldwide, ensuring a safer global workforce.
Vision
To be the leading safety equipment provider in the region, setting new standards for safety, innovation, and customer satisfaction.
Mission
Empowering safety through quality products and unwavering commitment to our clients' protection and peace of mind.
Motto
At AAA Safe Dubai, we live by the motto "Safety First, Always and Forever" - a testament to our unwavering dedication to safeguarding lives.
Message from founder
Guardians of Your Safety
In our relentless pursuit of safety excellence, we stand as your vigilant guardians, committed to delivering top-quality safety solutions, always prioritizing your well-being.
Mr. Abid Ali Asgar
Founder

title: Privacy Policy
body:
Privacy Policy
Introduction
Welcome to AAA Safe Dubai’s website. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you visit our website and interact with our services. By using our website, you consent to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.
Information We Collect
Personal Information
: We may collect your name, email address, phone number, and other contact information when you make an inquiry or place an order.
Non-Personal Information
: We may collect non-personal information such as your IP address, browser type, and device information to enhance your user experience.
How We Use Your Information
We may use your information for the following purposes:
Responding to inquiries and providing customer support.
Processing orders and payments.
Sending updates, promotional emails, and newsletters (you can opt-out anytime).
Improving our website and services.
Information Sharing
We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information with trusted service providers for the sole purpose of improving our services and fulfilling your requests.
Data Security
We take reasonable steps to protect your data from unauthorized access and use.
Your Choices
You can review and update your personal information by contacting us. You can also unsubscribe from marketing emails at any time.

title: Terms & Conditions
body:
Terms and Conditions
Acceptance of Terms
By using this website, you agree to these Terms and Conditions.
Ordering Products
Product Availability: We strive to keep our product listings up to date, but availability may change. We reserve the right to cancel or modify orders if products are unavailable.
Pricing: Prices are subject to change without notice. The price displayed at the time of order is the final price.
Payment: Payment is required at the time of order placement.
Returns and Refunds
Please refer to our Returns and Refunds Policy for information on product returns and refunds.
Intellectual Property
All content on this website, including text, images, logos, and designs, is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws. You may not use our content without our permission.
Limitation of Liability
We are not responsible for any indirect, consequential, or incidental damages arising from the use of our website or products.
Governing Law
These Terms and Conditions are governed by the laws of Dubai and the United Arab Emirates.
Contact Information
If you have any questions about these documents or any concerns regarding your privacy or terms of use, please contact us at aaasafedubai@hotmail.com
Remember that it’s crucial to have a legal professional review these documents to ensure they are compliant with relevant laws and regulations in Dubai and the UAE.
